content: शोभा [शुभ्-अ] {@--1@} Light, lustre, brilliance, radiance. {@--2@} ({%a%}) Splendour, beauty, elegance, grace, loveliness; वपुरभिनवमस्याः पुष्यति स्वां न शोभां <ls>Ś. 1. 19</ls>; <ls>Me. 52</ls>, <ls n="Me.">59.</ls> ({%b%}) Natural beauty, grandeur (as of a mountain); अद्रिशोभा <ls>R. 2. 27.</ls> {@--3@} An ornament, graceful expression; शोभैव मंदरक्षु ब्धक्षुभितांभोधिवर्णना <ls>Śi. 2. 107.</ls> {@--4@} Turmeric. {@--5@} A kind of pigment (= गोरोचना <ab>q. v.</ab>)
